content: Customers can track their orders using the order ID provided at checkout. Tracking updates are available within 24 hours of shipment.
Items can be returned within 30 days of delivery if unused and in original packaging. Electronics must include all accessories.
Refunds are processed within 7 business days after the returned item is received and inspected.
We accept credit cards, debit cards, UPI, PayPal, and net banking. Cash on delivery is available in select regions.
